title: Sleep Foundations - Week 1
subtitle: Understanding sleep science and hygiene
videoDescription: Explore the science behind sleep and why it's crucial for health.
description: Quality sleep is foundational to health. We'll explore sleep science and help you create the perfect conditions for restorative rest.
objectives: Understand sleep cycles and their importance
Establish consistent bedtime and wake time
activities: Sleep tracking setup and daily logging
keyPoints: Consistency is key - even on weekends
Your bedroom should be cool, dark, and quiet
Evening routines signal your body to wind down
